description: A Russian protest artist is held after Benjamin Griveaux is forced to ditch his Paris mayoral bid.
title: Petr Pavlensky: Russian who released Macron ally sex video arrested
title_page: Petr Pavlensky: Russian who released Macron ally sex video arrested - BBC News
maintext: Before his arrest, he told French news channel LCI that Mr Griveaux was only the first politician that he would target, saying he would carry on fighting the "propaganda and puritanism of politicians".
